name: The Escape Zone
description:
An Android Short Maze Game To Challenge You Up !

Play The Different 2 Modes, Classic And Timerun !

Take Control Of The Touch Button That Can Be A Joystick Too ! You Just Need To Press And Dont Release It, But You Must To Drag To Another Button ! That Sound Hard But You Must Try It !

There Will Be Puzzle Level That You Must To Solve With The Action Button !

Go For It ! And Wait For Other Release For More Level, Modes, And Bug Fixes !

Have Critics Or Suggestion ? Just Send It To This Email : ElectroNiceStudios@Gmail.com
